subject: CNN Alerts: My Custom Alert
body:
CNN Alerts: My Custom Alert






 



Alert Name: My Custom Alert
If you're a female singer, you'd better be sexy

05/18/07 01:01 PM, EDT
She was an "amazing talent," a young singer with a wonderful voice who wrote beautiful songs. But she was no beauty, plus flat-chested and overweight to boot.
FULL STORY
